mapper.select: SELECT task_num as taskNum , staff_num as staffNum , task_info as taskInfo , task_result as taskResult , task_reg_date as taskRegDate FROM um_task

SELECT s.staff_num as staffNum , s.staff_name as staffName ,j.jojic_name as jojicName ,l.level_name as levelName ,s.jojic_code as jojicCode FROM is_staff AS s INNER JOIN is_jojic AS j on s.jojic_code = j.jojic_code INNER join is_level AS l ON s.staff_level_code = l.level_code
